All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArpTable
Class representing an ARP table.
EndDevice
Class representing a End Device
Event
Class representing a event.
Header
Abstract class representing a header
HeaderType
Exhaustive list of all header types
IdGenerator
Singleton used to generate unique IDs for some elements of the simulation
Interface
Class representing an interface.
IpAddress
This class represents an IP address
IpHeader
Class representing an IP header
Layer
All layers that can be traced in a simulation
Link
Abstract class representing a link
Logger
Class used to trace all packets transmissions It uses Singleton design pattern.
LogSeverity
Enumeration of all log severity levels, used by logger
MacAddress
This class represents a MAC address
MacAddressContainer
Container to store all the MAC addresses existing.
MacHeader
Class representing a MAC header
NetworksCriticalException
Exception thrown when Critical error is encountered in program
Node
Abstract class representing a node
Packet
Class representing a packet.
PacketEvent
All packet events that can be traced in a simulation
PacketTracer
Class used to trace all packets transmissions It uses Singleton design pattern.
Pair<E,F>
Class used to store a pair of values.
PointToPointExample
Simple example building two end devices with a point to point link between them.
PointToPointHelper
Helper used to build a new point to Point link
PointToPointLink
Class representing a point to point link
RoutingTable
Class representing a routing table.
Schedulable
Interface that must be implemeted by all classes that contains at least one schedulable method
SchedulableMethod
Enumeration giving the methods that can be scheduled
Simulator
The simulator is used to scehdule events in the future.
Time
Class representing Time
